SETTINGS.bountyPadColorFirstHint: Hex Code of Color for First Color Bar
SETTINGS.bountyPadColorSecondHint: Hex Code of Color for Second Color Bar
SETTINGS.bountyPadColorThirdHint: Hex Code of Color for Third Color Bar
SETTINGS.bountyPadColorFontHint: Hex Code of Color for Text
SETTINGS.bountyPadSubColorFontHint: Hex Code of Color for SubText
SETTINGS.bountyPadColorShadowHint: Hex Code of Color for Text Drop Shadow
SETTINGS.bountyPadSubColorShadowHint: Hex Code of Color for SubText Drop Shadow
SETTINGS.bountyPadTimerHint: Number of Seconds for the splash screen to stay active
SETTINGS.bountyPadSoundHint: Play this sound when the splashscreen is rendered
SETTINGS.bountyPadMessageHint: Message dispalyed on the color bar. {{actor.name}} and {{token.name}} will be appropiately replaced.
SETTINGS.bountyPadSubTextHint: Text displayed on the second color bar. {{actor.name}} and {{token.name}} will be appropiately replaced.
SETTINGS.bountyPadAnimationDurationHint: Number of seconds for animation to finish. Set this to 0 for no animation.
SETTINGS.bountyPadAnimationDelayHint: Number of miliseconds for animation to be delayed before starting.
SETTINGS.bountyPadFontHint: Add new fonts to foundry using the built in font tool to use differnt fonts.
SETTINGS.bountyPadFontSizeHint: Any css value that is valid for font-size property.  Please use `# px` if using a specific value
SETTINGS.bountyPadSubFontSizeHint: Any css value that is valid for font-size property.  Please use `# px` If using a specific value
SETTINGS.bountyPadPermission.Title: Emit Splashscreen
SETTINGS.bountyPadPermission.TitleHint: Allow players with the selected role and above to send a Splash Screen.
SETTINGS.bountyPadTokenHUDHint: Toggles showing the Token HUD icon for Boss Splash
bountyPad.ErrorGM: Your account level is not permitted to use this command.
bountyPad.ErrorCount: You may only display single overlay at time.
